sourcesContent:
export const About = (props) => { return (

{props.data ? props.data.titleAbout : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.paragraph : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.titleSkills : ''} {props.data ? props.data.subTitleSkills : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.textSkills : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.subTextSkills : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.Skills.map((d, i) => (
{d.language}{d.percentage}
)) : "loading"}
) }
